trans-unit.source: In the **Hybrid connections** blade, click the hybrid connection you just created, then click **Listener Setup**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Hybrid connections** blade, click the hybrid connection you just created, then click **Listener Setup**.

trans-unit.source: Under **On-premises Hybrid Connection Manager**, choose **download and configure manually**, save the downloaded the HybridConnectionManager.msi package, and copy the the gateway connection string.
trans-unit.target: Under **On-premises Hybrid Connection Manager**, choose **download and configure manually**, save the downloaded the HybridConnectionManager.msi package, and copy the the gateway connection string.

trans-unit.source: From an administrator command prompt, type the following command to start the installer:
trans-unit.target: From an administrator command prompt, type the following command to start the installer:

trans-unit.source: After the installer runs, click **Not now**, then browse to the %ProgramFiles%\Microsoft\HybridConnectionManager folder, run HCMConfigWizard.exe and click **Yes** in the **User Account Control** dialog.
trans-unit.target: After the installer runs, click **Not now**, then browse to the %ProgramFiles%\Microsoft\HybridConnectionManager folder, run HCMConfigWizard.exe and click **Yes** in the **User Account Control** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Paste the hybrid connection string that you copied earlier and click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Paste the hybrid connection string that you copied earlier and click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Hybrid connections** blade, the **Status** column now shows **Connected**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Hybrid connections** blade, the **Status** column now shows **Connected**.
